Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Hindi \Hin"di\, n. [Prop. a Per. adj. meaning, Indian, Hindoo.] The name given by Europeans to that form of the Hindustani language which is chiefly spoken by native Hindus. In employs the Devanagari character, in which Sanskrit is written. --Whitworth. [1913 Webster]

Hindi adj : of or relating to or supporting Hinduism; "the Hindu faith" [syn: {Hindu}, {Hindoo}] n : the most widely spoken of modern Indic vernaculars; spoken mostly in the north of India; along with English it is the official language of India; usually written in Devanagari script
